statements: SELECT image_id, image_data FROM image_data;
SELECT image_data, image_id FROM image_data;
SELECT * FROM image_data WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT image_id FROM image_data ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM image_data;
SELECT * FROM image_data WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT image_id FROM image_data WHERE image_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', 'a1234567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
SELECT * FROM image_data WHERE image_id = 'a1234567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND image_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT image_id, COUNT(*) AS total_images FROM image_data GROUP BY image_id ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT image_id, LENGTH(image_data) AS data_length FROM image_data ORDER BY data_length ASC;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_id, image_label FROM images WHERE image_label = 'cat';
SELECT training_id, image_id, label_id FROM training_data WHERE label_id = '123';
SELECT image_id, image_label FROM images WHERE image_label LIKE '%sun%';
SELECT image_id, COUNT(*) AS total_images FROM images GROUP BY image_id;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_label = 'cat';
SELECT image_label, image_id FROM images ORDER BY image_label ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE label_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY training_id DESC;
SELECT image_data FROM images WHERE image_label LIKE '%dog%';
SELECT training_id, image_id FROM training_data WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT label_name FROM labels ORDER BY label_name DESC;
SELECT id, label_id FROM image_labels WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE id = 3;
SELECT image_id, COUNT(label_id) AS label_count FROM image_labels GROUP BY image_id ORDER BY label_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM images JOIN image_labels ON images.id = image_labels.image_id WHERE image_labels.label_id = 1;
SELECT image_data, label_name FROM images JOIN image_labels ON images.id = image_labels.image_id JOIN labels ON image_labels.label_id = labels.id WHERE images.id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT images.id, label_name FROM images JOIN image_labels ON images.id = image_labels.image_id JOIN labels ON image_labels.label_id = labels.id WHERE label_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT image_labels.image_id, COUNT(image_labels.label_id) AS label_count FROM image_labels GROUP BY image_labels.image_id ORDER BY label_count DESC;
SELECT images.id, COUNT(label_id) AS label_count FROM images JOIN image_labels ON images.id = image_labels.image_id GROUP BY images.id HAVING label_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM ImageData;
SELECT image_id, image_label FROM ImageData WHERE image_label IS NOT NULL;
SELECT label_id, label_name FROM Labels ORDER BY label_name DESC;
SELECT training_id, image_id, label_id FROM TrainingData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT model_id, model_name, accuracy FROM ModelData WHERE accuracy >= 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_label FROM ImageData WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT image_id, image_label FROM ImageData WHERE image_label IS NOT NULL ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT label_name FROM Labels WHERE label_name ILIKE 'car%';
SELECT * FROM TrainingData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT model_id, model_name, accuracy FROM ModelData WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY accuracy DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM image_data;
SELECT image_name, image_data FROM image_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT label_name FROM labels ORDER BY label_name DESC;
SELECT image_id, label_id FROM image_labels WHERE label_id = 3;
SELECT model_id, accuracy, loss FROM model_performance WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM image_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_name FROM image_data WHERE id = 2;
SELECT image_id, label_id FROM image_labels ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT label_name FROM labels WHERE label_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT model_id, accuracy, loss FROM model_performance WHERE accuracy > 0.9;
